name: peeqMe
tag_list: development, microfeedback, personality-profile, behavior-profile, talent-profile, personality-assessment, talent-assessment, 360-feedback, employee-engagement, employee-development, mentors, coaches, leadership-development, performance-management, streng
overview:
PeeqMe is an elegantly simple, social, mobile app that puts the user first in talent development and team performance.

For the social/knowledge economy, human capital creates the value. The enemy of that is disengagement by people and friction between people. PeeqMe increases engagement through daily interaction with users’ own natural gifts, and reduces friction by adding rich, personal context when we work in dispersed and diverse teams.

PeeqMe fills a gap on profiling and collecting 360-feedback on “how” people work, not just what they did/accomplished. PeeqMe creates user profiles from their unique types, based on the most popular personality, behavior, and talent assessments. By focusing on what’s special inside, the innate, natural strengths and styles of our users, peeqMe elevates engagement levels.

Furthermore, peeqMe allows organizational values and behaviors/competencies to be added to profiles to catch members demonstrating how they work. By relating to their organization’s intent, our members get caught demonstrating performance consistent with their affiliated organizations on a continuous cycle by customers, colleagues, management or partners (whether business, service, community, or faith-based).

By creating circles of boosters, mentors and coaches, their fresh, frequent, focused feedback empowers our members. Furthermore, in a diverse and dispersed workplace, insights derived from rich but simple profiles reduces team conflicts from misuse and misunderstanding, and drives team performance to higher levels of productivity and innovation.

PeeqMe is the user-driven, follow-me app for personal and professional development. Use it wherever you work… on the job, at home, or in your community.
